shinyF7 is particularly well suited to build shiny gagdet. To convert an existing app
to a gadget, wrap it in the `shiny::runGadget()` function. 


<img src="figures/f7_gadget.png" width="405" height="629" class="img-shadow">

```r
library(shiny)
library(shinyF7)
runGadget(shinyAppDir(system.file("examples/tab_layout", package = "shinyF7")))
```
